page.title: 11My School Day Continued
page.content:
I then rush home,get a quick tea and go to guides.Guides ends at 9.00.I go home have a bath and something to eat and finally,at around 10.30,I fall in to bed with my eyes closed and fall to sleep.
This is an average day in the life of a Primary School pupil aged 11. A great many children are members of clubs and societies but there is a great lack of leisure facilities such as swimming pools, tennis courts and sports centres. A great deal of time is spent by parents transporting children into Altrincham,Stockton Heath and Warrington where such facilities exist.
